text: My nisposlali tebe [, Mukhammad,] eto Pisaniye (t. ye. Koran) kak istinu dlya podtverzhdeniya togo, chto bylo [skazano] prezhde v pisaniyakh, chtoby predokhranit' ikh [ot iskazheniya]. Tak sudi zhe ikh soglasno tomu, chto nisposlal Allakh, i ne poddavaysya ikh zhelaniyam, [uklonyayas'] ot istiny, kotoraya yavilas' k tebe. Kazhdomu iz vas my ustanovili [razlichnyye] zakony very i predpisaniya. Yesli by zakhotel Allakh, to on sdelal by vas odnoy obshchinoy [veruyushchikh], odnako [On ne sdelal], chtoby ispytat' vas v tom, chto vam daroval. Tak staraytes' zhe prevzoyti drug druga v dobrykh deyaniyakh. K Allakhu vsem vam vozvrashcheniye, i povedayet On vam [istinu] o tom, v chem vy byli ne soglasny drug s drugom
